title: 清除点燃的TNT指令
author: 嘴角上扬
txt_content: 侦测到点燃的TNT就清除的那种

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
1.11以上指令kill @e[type=tnt]
1.8-1.10指令kill @e[type=PrimeTnt]
1.7一下没有指令,放水吧，，

pineapple_ 发表于 2017-2-9 16:29
1.11以上指令kill @e[type=tnt]
1.8-1.10指令kill @e[type=PrimeTnt]
